item.description:
We'll spend a little while meeting and sharing what's up with ourselves and our work, then Matt Bastide has generously offered to share his thoughts on Core Data & data modeling in general. He writes:

"Core data is huge and a little hard to get into, even with Apple's built-in templates. This will be a brief talk to get people new to core data and data modeling started with building data driven apps in iOS.   Two excellent third-party libraries (mogenerator and Magical Record) will be introduced to help make working core data a little easier."

Thanks Matt! He's already provided me with a boost in that area, so I do think you will appreciate. Our host has offered to supply beer and I'll bring the nuts.

Join us?  Please rsvp if you think the answer is YES.
item.how_to_find_us: please call me at 332-2098 if you're locked out
item.name: Meet and talk iOS - a look at data modeling/Core Data with Matt
